body.name: Nintendo Wii Console, White Premium Bundle (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Bundle Includes: Wii Console, 2 Wii Remotes, 2 Nunchuks, 2 Wii Remote Jackets, Sensor Bar, Wii AC Adaptor, Wii AV Cable And Controller Charging Dock
Two Included Rechargeable Batteries For Your Controller
Plays two disc formats in a single, self-loading media bay
Built-in Wi-Fi Access For Easy Connection To Internet
Thorough cleaning, carefully tested and guaranteed. Comes with a 90-day Amazon Certified Refurbished guarantee
How to SYNC Wii controller: 1. Press red SYNC button below batteries on Wii controller 2. While lights blink on controller press red SYNC button on Wii console.
Nintendo Wii Console wth Backwards Compatible GameCube Ports
body.description: The Nintendo Wii is a family-friendly video game console that is not only entertaining but also interactive as well. With motion-control technology, the gamer can truly interact with the game on a personal level, rather than participating as a passive player. A pioneer in interactive gaming, Nintendo has enabled its video games to be more lifelike and cooperative. All new Nintendo Wii consoles come with one Wii Remote Plus controller, one Nunchuk controller for specific gaming, and a Wii Sensor bar. Up to four Wii Remote Plus controllers can be connected at once using built-in wireless technology powered by Bluetooth.. The Wii controller has a sensor on it that enables the user to select menu preferences, scroll through screens, and activate the game itself. Purchasing a Wii-enabled yoga mat or Wii Fit balance board further elevates the gaming experience. With the ability to exercise, dance, and meditate, exercise-oriented video games transform the home into a gym. *DLC (Downloadable Content) may not be included and is not guaranteed to work*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is not a review of the Wii itself, but of the Amazon Renewed bundle. If you need a Wii review, this isn't for you.Now, the box was very generic, and shipped inside another box. The contents were all wrapped in plastic and had cellophane or similar that peeled off. I wasn't expecting the nun-chuk controllers or the nonslip grips that cover the normal controllers, but they were there. Nor was I expecting the rechargeable batteries. Maybe that was in the description and I missed it. Anyway, like-new condition, nothing installed, works just fine. Needed to get this and a balance board for back, core, and balance issues. Happy to have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did Not Work
reviews.reviewText: I hesitated to purchase a refurbished console for my children as a Christmas gift and I should have listened to my gut. I just connected it to the tv and powered it up, with my daughters waiting on the couch to start playing and after having the remotes charging all night, we anxiously pressed “A” on the remote as the very first prompt to setup the console and it wouldn’t work, for either remote. After 45 minutes with tech support, I need to return the item to the seller. I wanted to be positive and purchase refurbished to help with the environment and waste, but it was a complete let down.This didn’t even get past step one! How do you sell a project that doesn’t even sync on the FIRST step? So disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect this to be in such good shape. I knew how old these machines were but wanted it for my gaming son. Was shocked when I opened it and all the accessories came out and were bubbled wrapped and in perfect condition. It works perfectly and we have had no issues. Everything you need is there to play with. I was really impressed. Only bad thing was the console had a bunch of black stuff all over it so wasn't sure what it was and am trying to scrub it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It didn't come with the grips
reviews.reviewText: So far the system seems to work fine. I wish the instructions were more in depth in how it works and the set up process. My biggest obstacle was trying to figure out how to use the remote when you first get things started. You have to sync it, which is on the instruction paper, but what it doesn't tell you is that you need the motion bar plugged in and in a good place in order to use the remote. I had a Wii when they first came out and didn't remember if the bar was required. Maybe its not, but it certainly made life easier. Once you get that figured out you just have to follow the prompts on the tv. I will need to get an AV to HDMI converter in order for me to use it on my living room tv, but luckily I had an old tv from about 10 years ago that still had the AV ports. My only other complaint so far is that it didn't come with the remote grips. It came with the straps, but not the actual grips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wii doesn’t turn on
reviews.reviewText: *Update, contacted seller and he thought it was the power adapter. He rushed me a new adapter in time for Christmas. It works! Thank you!The Wii won’t turn on. Tried multiple outlets and nothing. Emailed seller yesterday to see if I can get it replaced before Christmas. Haven’t heard back. Will update when I do.Also, just a tip for those lucky enough to get a working console, if you have a smart TV, you will need a Wii to HDMI adapter. There are no AV inputs (red, yellow, white) on newer TV’s which is what the Wii has. Update, contacted seller and he thought it was the power adapter. He rushed me a new adapter in time for Christmas. It works! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had a small issue at first, but contacted seller and let’s just say the problem was resolved faster than immediately! I am tickled with this set and especially with the excellent customer service I received. Works great, happy camper here :) I’ll be telling all my friends and family about the quality and service I received purchasing this unit. :) Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer Beware - Not Refurbished
reviews.reviewText: First time purchasing an item through Amazon’s Refurbished program. It arrived packed well, in a HelloFresh box. Upon unboxing it was apparent that the item was not in “Like New” or even “Good” condition. It looked as if someone had pulled it out of their basement after sitting for 10 years. It was dirty, the remotes yellowing and scratched, one missing a lens. They were sticky and the buttons were crunchy. It did include a rechargeable battery pack and stand which was as advertised, and the only item “Like New”. I essentially had to refurbish the other items myself. There were carpet beetle larvae husks in the disk slot and the ports were covered in grime and dirt. The nunchucks were in “Moderate” condition, also seemingly untouched from storage.It turns on and for the first 6-10 hours of use has seemingly no issues internally. However, after the 3rd week of light use, it began having issues reading disks when first put in the console and has began crashing once booted up and in game.I know they source these products through different “refurbishment” companies so your order result may vary, but it was not a good experience and felt like an all around scam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was like brand new when opened. Packaged perfectly. Worked perfectly. Nervous because I ordered only a few days before Christmas, received on time very quickly. Thank you to the seller. Very satisfied.
